DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to investigate different methods to evaluate the effect of AZD4017 in adipose tissue after single and multiple doses of AZD4017 in abdominally obese but otherwise healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Methods That Assess the Effect of AZD4017 in Adipose Tissue
DOC.criteria: Provision of signed written and dated informed consent Have a body mass index (BMI) between 27 and 35 kg/m2 Waist circumference of >102 cm History of any clinical significant disease Any clinically significant illness, medical/surgical procedure or trauma within 4 weeks of the first administration of investigational product Any clinically significant abnormalities in clinical chemistry, haematology or urinalysis results as judged by the investigator
